title: Issue and effect of share warrants to bearer.
content: 81.-(1) A company limited by shares, which is an admitted company in a regulated market, if so authorized by its articles, may, with respect to any fully paid-up shares, issue under its common seal a warrant stating that the bearer of the warrant is entitled to the shares therein specified, and may provide, by coupons or otherwise, for the payment of the future dividends on the shares included in the warrant. (2) Such a warrant as aforesaid is in this Law termed a â€œshare warrant." (3) A share warrant shall entitle the bearer thereof to the shares therein specified, and the shares may be transferred by delivery of the warrant. Penalty for personation of shareholder.
